About us Services Products Write us

High quality coal from different origin

Bashtrade Pte. Ltd. is headquartered in 2022 in Singapore and specializes in the trading of coal and carbon materials on the international market. Our expertise lies in the sourcing, shipping & trading of coal to meet our customers’ demand using innovative, value adding logistics solutions.

About us

Bashtrade Pte Ltd

focuses primarily on the marketing and sourcing of materials for steel mills, ferroalloy plants, soda plants and the management of all parts of the supply chain, from producer to consumer.

Bashtrade focuses primarily on the marketing and sourcing of materials for steel mills, ferroalloy plants, soda plants and the management of all parts of the supply chain, from producer to consumer.

Singapore is the top commodity trading hub in Asia and the shipping capital of the world. Strategically located amongst the resource rich nations such as Australia, Indonesia, and consumers such as India and China, Malaysia and South Korea. It allows Singapore to take a key competitive advantage over other nations.
Furthermore, Singapore’s supportive regulatory framework, world class financial center facilities and reputable infrastructure together makes it an appealing hub for commodity trading companies.
For this reason, Bashtrade Pte Ltd choose Singapore as main office in Asian market.

Dayan Akhmerov

Director Bashtrade Pte Ltd
  • Dayan Akhmerov experience in the commodity trading more than 15 years.
  • Started my career at Mechel, as sales manager across different commodities such as thermal coal, coking coal, anthracite and PCI.
  • Following that, he joined Lanturno as Head of Sales, and as General Director where he set up his own company in Russia. After that he joined biggest anthracite producer in the World, Company Siberian Anthracite and worked more than 4 years as Heas of Sale.
  • He later set up Bashtrade Pte Ltd in 2022 and is currently director of the company.
services

What we do

Our team have 15 years’ experience in coal and coke trading and shipping. Using existing network with producers in different counties and knowing shipowners allowing us to provide following services:
Consultation in sourcing of coal with special specifications, such low sulfur, low phosphorus content coals.
Marketing services : finding buyers in Europe and Asian markets.
Chartering: chartering vessels, which will help to reduce transportation costs.
Logistics: Finding suitable logistic supply chain in bulk and containers, which are used mainly for anthracite and carbon additive.
Together with international inspection companies such SGS, CCIC, BV we send out representatives to participate and control the sampling process at loading port and discharging port as well.
